name: Loopy Particle Simulator
description:
Loopy Particle Simulator is an open-ended puzzle game (Zachtronic-style) where you construct a particle accelerator. Make particles speed up in loops and use collision chambers to create new and exciting particles!

  • 7 Introduction levels
  • a Free Play mode where you can toy with particles
  • a demo level to show an advanced circuit
  • save and load of your creation in Free Play mode

(Particles names are imaginary, sorry for scientists)

Post screenshots of your circuits in the comments or on twitter @NuSan_fx I would love to see them!

First version of Loopy Particle Simulator has been created for Ludum Dare 47 in 72h by:

  • NuSan: code/design/visual
  • Lutopia: music
